feature.summary: The RLC in Unacknowledged Mode feature provides reduced control signaling

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) lost for RLC UM bearers for                                     which at least a part has been transmitted over the air in the                                     downlink direction.  This applies if it was decided that no more transmission are                                     attempted, due to reasons other than handover.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) lost for RLC UM bearers for                                     which at least a part has been transmitted over the air in the                                     downlink direction.  This applies if it was decided that no more transmission are                                     attempted, due to reasons other than handover.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010961 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010961 MO instance.
